imdb.plot outline: The CI is a scripted drama that chronicles the real-life exploits of Confidential Informant Greg Smith, who began as a hardened criminal and, through a twist of fate, now goes deep undercover, working with ATF to bring down gun runners, murderers and notorious drug dealers.
imdb.title: The CI
plot: _The CI_ (qv) is a scripted drama that chronicles the real-life exploits of Confidential Informant Greg Smith, who began as a hardened criminal and, through a twist of fate, now goes deep undercover, working with ATF to bring down gun runners, murderers and notorious drug dealers.::Tony Dimond
